Storytelling, building community, connecting with others 🎤

Feb 11, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • let's care
  • storytelling
  • community building
  • empathy

Matt Scott, creator of Let’s Care joins us to talk about their experiences as a story teller and community builder. We’ll talk about their craft, the ways empathy can lead to connection, and the lessons they’ve learned along their path.
